item.title: 菲律宾指责中国海岸警卫队进行 "危险演习"，导致在南海发生碰撞。
item.description:
The Philippines accused China's coast guard of carrying out "dangerous manoeuvres" that led to a collision in the South China Sea.

Beijing claims sovereignty over most of the South China Sea, a claim a court ruled has no legal basis. pic.twitter.com/usLdeRrHgP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 詹姆斯-克兰伯里（James Crumbley）过失杀人罪的审判将于妻子在儿子校园枪击案中被判有罪数周后开始。
item.description:
James Crumbley's manslaughter trial to begin weeks after wife found guilty in son's school shooting. https://t.co/EvbjcCsMFu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）周二敲定了一项规定，将信用卡的一般滞纳金从 32 美元降至 8 美元。
item.description:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau finalized a rule Tuesday that will cut the typical credit card late fee to $8 from $32. https://t.co/At0flyXn72

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在洛杉矶清白项目接手被定罪的杀人犯斯科特-彼得森一案不到两个月后，加利福尼亚州圣马特奥县的一名法官安排了一次情况听证会。

item.title: 在武装团伙袭击了这个加勒比国家最大的两所监狱并释放了数十名囚犯之后，海地进入了紧急状态并实行夜间宵禁，暴力事件激增。
item.description:

item.title: 英国警方找回了近三十年前在意大利从奥地利一级方程式赛车手格哈德-伯杰（Gerhard Berger）那里失窃的一辆法拉利跑车。
item.description:
A very fast car has made a very slow return.

British police have recovered a Ferrari stolen from Austrian Formula One driver Gerhard Berger in Italy almost three decades ago. https://t.co/QcR3qvlaGO pic.twitter.com/12HtORWUgH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 生日快乐查理和克雷格-里德（Charlie and Craig Reid），即 "I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles) "乐队（The Proclaimers）的主唱，今天 62 岁了。
item.description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY: Charlie and Craig Reid, better known as "I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)" singers The Proclaimers, are 62 today. https://t.co/doAjvcrRZJ pic.twitter.com/GpJBLqO96d

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在举家准备出发去春游的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:
As families get set to take off for spring break, a new video of a woman battling over a window shade on a plane has sparked a new question about comfort and courtesy for travelers. https://t.co/cG6YGheLz1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 2022 年，达米安-博斯切托偶然发现了一具距今 7000 万年的巨大化石，这竟然是一具几乎完整的长颈恐龙骨架。
item.description:
In 2022, Damien Boschetto stumbled upon a massive, 70 million-year-old fossil that turned out to be a nearly complete skeleton of a long-necked dinosaur.

And it all happened while he was walking his dog.https://t.co/q8mSE9pu1e pic.twitter.com/CPsETbXtfW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 法国立法者周一在凡尔赛宫举行的历史性议会联席会议上批准了一项法案，将妇女堕胎的权利写入国家宪法。
item.description:
French lawmakers approved a bill on Monday that will enshrine a woman’s right to an abortion in the nation's constitution during a historic joint session of parliament at the Palace of Versailles. https://t.co/187AJFkbDN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 本周末，本季最大的暴风雪袭击了加利福尼亚内华达山脉，一些地区的积雪超过了 10 英尺。据帕利塞德-太浩滑雪场报告，山顶的阵风达到 190 英里/小时。
item.description:
The biggest snowstorm of the season hit California’s Sierra Nevada mountains over the weekend, with some areas reporting more than 10 feet of snow. Palisades Tahoe ski resort reported a wind gust of 190 mph at the summit. pic.twitter.com/zdEowSOGBB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: Opill 的母公司周一表示，首款无需处方即可购买的非处方避孕药 Opill 将于本月晚些时候在网上和药店发售。
item.description:
Opill, the first over-the-counter birth control pill that can be purchased without a prescription, will be available later this month online and in pharmacies, its parent company said Monday. https://t.co/6e30DAKmBj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据俄亥俄州警方称，周六，一名邮政工作人员在他的邮车上遭到 "有针对性的袭击"，不幸中弹身亡。
item.description:
A postal worker was in his mail van when he was fatally shot in a "targeted attack" on Saturday, according to police in Ohio. https://t.co/S5Zp43zk7U

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 一位摄影师在 2 月底杏花盛开的季节，在加利福尼亚州特雷西的一个果园里拍摄到了令人惊叹的延时摄影镜头。
item.description:
A photographer captured stunning timelapse footage of almond blossoms in an orchard in Tracy, California, during peak blooming season at the end of February. pic.twitter.com/CSkGKNYLdk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 索托马约尔（Sotomayor）、卡根（Kagan）和杰克逊（Jackson）三位大法官说，最高法院的多数法官在裁定只有国会才能执行第 14 修正案中的取消资格条款时走得太远了。
item.description:
Justices Sotomayor, Kagan and Jackson said the Supreme Court's majority went too far in deciding only Congress can enforce the 14th Amendment disqualification clause. https://t.co/X8b1ZoFIR8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 由于唐纳德-特朗普在 1 月 6 日前后的所作所为，最高法院周一在一起历史性案件中做出了有利于他的裁决，根据第 14 修正案第 3 条，他有资格寻求共和党总统提名。
item.description:
The Supreme Court on Monday ruled in favor of Donald Trump in a historic case challenging his eligibility to seek the Republican presidential nomination under Section 3 of the 14th Amendment due to his actions surrounding Jan. 6. https://t.co/NBK6nRLKkx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 官方消息：奥利伊-克拉瓦罗（Auli'i Cravalho）将回归为即将上映的动画续集《莫阿娜》配音。克拉瓦罗在 Instagram 上分享了一段自己庆祝这一消息的视频，并说道："当你正式回归莫图努伊时的感觉"。
item.description:
It's official: Auli'i Cravalho is returning as the voice of Moana for the upcoming animated sequel.

Cravalho shared a video of herself celebrating the news to Instagram saying, "The feeling when you're officially returning to Motunui."https://t.co/j4P87xR49d pic.twitter.com/Izozk3VKVG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：周一晚间，一架单引擎飞机在田纳西州纳什维尔试图紧急迫降时坠毁，造成数人死亡。
item.description:
BREAKING: Several people have died after a single-engine plane crashed as it attempted to make an emergency landing in Nashville, Tennessee, on Monday night.

A spokesperson for the Nashville Fire Department said the plane imploded on impact. https://t.co/d5JDOdLlqx pic.twitter.com/c4fBD26aJs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）的头号政治对手本尼-甘茨（Benny Gantz）本周将与高级官员会面，这激起了人们对拜登政府正试图与以色列极右翼政府保持距离的猜测。
item.description:
Benny Gantz, a top political rival of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, is meeting with high-level officials this week, stoking speculation that the Biden administration is trying to distance itself from Israel's far-right government.https://t.co/06qdSt0m9N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: "超级星期二"，我们将努力保持竞争力。我希望我们能继续前进，"海利周五说。"但这关系到我们能有多大的竞争力"。
item.description:
"Super Tuesday, we're going to try to be competitive. I hope we go forward," Haley said on Friday. "But this is all about how competitive we can be." https://t.co/2CYVGEgc4q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据 @ABC 新闻报道，根据投票分析，唐纳德-特朗普预计将赢得北达科他州的共和党党团会议。
item.description:
BREAKING: Donald Trump is projected to win North Dakota's Republican caucuses, based on analysis of the vote, @ABC News reports. https://t.co/UPvQg9IvBv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 周一拍摄的无人机视频显示了得克萨斯州潘汉德尔（Panhandle）大面积烟房溪火灾的破坏程度。自上周爆发以来，该州燃烧的多处野火已经烧毁了 100 多万亩土地。
item.description:
Drone video captured Monday shows the extent of damage from the massive Smokehouse Creek Fire in the Texas Panhandle.

Multiple wildfires burning in the state have scorched more than 1 million acres since breaking out last week. https://t.co/YEzgkwjoen pic.twitter.com/8NUQlKUkPY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 您将在哪里观看 4 月 8 日的日全食？还有几周时间，您就可以从陆地、海上或空中选择您的地点，观看日全食。
item.description:
